question.Title: Python - Sum of Excel cell range
question.Body:
I am completely new to python
I have an excel sheet as below: 

        Column A  Column B   Column C         Column D  Row 1   Mathew    abc       89499052          17895077  Row 2   Job       def       89499158          17920464  Row 3   Robin     ehj       89499254          17901346  Row 4                      Sumof(C1+c2+c3)   Sumof(D1+D2+D3)  Row 5                      Result of D4/C4

I need a code snippet for below:
1. Open the excel sheet in certain path(E:/Excelfiles/abc.csv)
2. Find the required values C4 and D4.
3. Find value of C5.
Can someone please help me out?

answer.Body:
Sure, you should use Pandas.

import pandas as padf = pa.read_csv('E:/Excelfiles/abc.csv')cSum = df['Column C'].sum()dSum = df['Column D'].sum()d4 = df['Column D'].iloc[3]c4 = df['Column C'].iloc[3]

I let you find the code left. Please check the read_csv function as it may need the encoding parameter depending on your csv file.You will need to learn Pandas Doc Tutorial Article Book R in Python CookBook
